title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, when I create a new file f1.txt and select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, nothing happens.
EB: I expect that when I select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, all the open files that have been saved should be closed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Use build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Create a new file f1.txt.
3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
